description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Go Ballistic in the most intense twin-stick shooter ever.  With co-op play, 9 game-changing ship enhancements, infinite waves, 5 unique challenges, online scoreboards (Gold membership required), and thousands of explosions per minute, Ballistic is the ultimate twin-stick shooter.  Ballistic is the seventh and final game in the highly-rated Radiangames series.
